meanings.sent1: The unexampled discovery left the scientists in awe.
meanings.sent2: Her unexampled talent for painting amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The unexampled idea of a flying car made us all chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His unexampled courage in the face of danger inspired us all.
meanings.sent5: The unexampled beauty of the sunset took our breath away.

meanings.sent1: The unexampled speed of the cheetah impressed the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent2: Their unexampled generosity towards others was truly admirable.
meanings.sent3: The unexampled size of the ice cream cone made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: His unexampled strength in lifting the heavy weights amazed the gym members.
meanings.sent5: The unexampled success of the new product launch exceeded all expectations.
